product_name: Mountainsmith Travel Duffel - X-Large - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: The Mountainsmith X-Large Travel duffel offers generous storage space and an efficient design so you can easily pack lots of bulky gear for long trips. Durable nylon fabric stands up to wear and tear. Zippered main compartment opens wide for easy access when packing and unpacking; exterior zippered pocket keeps small items close at hand. Wrapped handles make carrying comfortable; haul handles on ends provide extra carrying power. Compression straps stabilize load. Special buy.
short_description: The Mountainsmith X-Large Travel duffel offers generous storage space and an efficient design so you can easily pack lots of bulky gear for long trips.
